desc: Handmade 3-layer washable cloth face masks for the general public. Made by local Adelaide business

layout.text: AusMasks - Australian Made Washable Cloth Face Masks

New collections in stock now! All online orders are processed and dispatched within 1-2 business days. Same Day Dispatch if ordered Tuesday to Friday.
AusMasks make high quality washable face masks for the general public.
Our 3 layer masks comprise 2 outer layers of poly-cotton (POPLIN) while the 3rd inner layer is a thicker felt pad.
AusMasks are handmade in Adelaide, South Australia and proudly carry the official ‘Made in Australia’ badge.
CLICK HERE TO SHOP ALL MASKS
